meanings.definition: A military decoration awarded to members of the armed forces wounded or killed in action.
meanings.sent1: The soldier proudly displayed his purplehearts on his uniform.
meanings.sent2: Purplehearts are given to brave soldiers who have been injured in battle.
meanings.sent3: At the ceremony, the purplehearts seemed to shine brighter than the sun.
meanings.sent4: To earn purplehearts, one must show exceptional courage in the face of danger.
meanings.sent5: The purplehearts symbolize the sacrifices made by our military heroes.

meanings.definition: A plant with heart-shaped leaves and purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the purplehearts added a pop of color with their vibrant blooms.
meanings.sent2: Purplehearts are known for their beautiful heart-shaped leaves.
meanings.sent3: The purplehearts in the flower bed seemed to be dancing in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The purplehearts in the garden stood out like royalty among the other plants.
meanings.sent5: The purplehearts' delicate petals swayed gracefully in the wind.
